responsibilities: Work closely with robotics, deployment, and sales teams to identify customer needs and conceptualize machine learning solutions.
Build product features, data pipelines, and tooling for visualizing and understanding machine learning models.
Create and adapt state-of-the-art model architectures in Tensorflow or PyTorch to solve unique, high-value problems.
Apply best practices in data science to help the team draw actionable conclusions from data and performance results.
Automate, manage, and validate data collection pipelines and processes with the machine learning team.
Collect, organize, and present performance results to stakeholders.
Monitor, train, and validate the performance of deep learning models.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on machine learning solutions, data pipelines, model architectures, and deep learning models. However, there is no specific mention of language models or fine-tuning techniques related to large language models (LLMs) like GPT. The responsibilities are more aligned with general machine learning and deep learning tasks rather than domain-specific language model customization.
